node_info.name: timeSaved
node_info.description: Dynamically track time saved based on the workflow’s execution path and the number of items processed

properties.displayName: For each run, time saved is the sum of all Time Saved nodes that execute. Use this when different execution paths or items save different amounts of time.
properties.name: notice
mode
properties.description: Counts minutes saved once for all input items

options.name: Once For All Items
options.description: Counts minutes saved once for all input items

options.name: Per Item
options.description: Multiply minutes saved by the number of input items

properties.name: minutesSaved
properties.description: Number of minutes saved by this workflow execution

notice.displayName: For each run, time saved is the sum of all Time Saved nodes that execute. Use this when different execution paths or items save different amounts of time.
notice.name: notice

possibleValues.name: Once For All Items
possibleValues.description: Counts minutes saved once for all input items

possibleValues.name: Per Item
possibleValues.description: Multiply minutes saved by the number of input items

notices.name: notice
notices.text: For each run, time saved is the sum of all Time Saved nodes that execute. Use this when different execution paths or items save different amounts of time.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
